Name: Refund Me If You Can
About the game: Sarah is having a nightmare. Only you can wake her up. To achieve this you will have to find your way through the maze. When playing this game, you agree to finish it before asking for a refund, unless you are a coward. Keep an eye on the clock, time passes by fast. After two hours the achievement will be locked forever. For that you will have to try many paths, again and again. The game contains more than 100 different paths, but only one to salvation. Throw flares to remember your tracks. . Beware of environmental destruction features. . Pay attention to noises and take in consideration writings. . Push through obstacles. . Don't get caught by the monster. . One last tip, NEVER STAY MORE THEN 45 SECONDS IN THE SAME POSITION !
